Class Calculator

                    +--Calculator
public class Calculator
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements CalculatorIF

This class implements the operations of a pocket calculator. It is designed in such a way that the operations can be executed remotely.

The Remote interface serves to identify interfaces whose methods may be invoked from a non-local virtual machine.

See Also:
